Structs/Axes.html.name: Axes
Structs/Axes.html.abstract: A struct that contains a centerX and centerY constraints.

Structs/Dimensions.html.name: Dimensions
Structs/Dimensions.html.abstract: A struct that contains a width and height constraints

Structs/Sides.html.name: Sides
Structs/Sides.html.abstract: A struct that contains a top, bottom, left, and right constraints

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: Relation
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: typealias to NSLayoutConstraint.Relation

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrain(sides:_:to:constant:isSafe:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Adds and activates one or more side constraints.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrain(side:_:to:of:constant:isSafe:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Adds and activates a SideY (top/bottom) constraint that will be pinned to a SideY of the given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrain(side:_:toCenterYof:constant:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Adds and activates a SideY (top/bottom) constraint that will be

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrain(side:_:to:of:constant:isSafe:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Adds and activates a SideX (left/right) constraint that will be pinned to a SideX of the given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrain(side:_:toCenterXof:constant:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Adds and activates a SideX (left/right) constraint that will be

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrain(dimension:_:constant:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Adds and activates a Dimension (width/height) constraint that is relative to a constant.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrain(dimension:_:to:of:multiplier:constant:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Adds and activates a Dimension (width/height) constraint that is relative to another given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrain(dimensions:_:to:multiplier:constant:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Adds and activates one or both Dimension (width/height) constraints that are relative to another given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrain(axes:_:to:constant:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Adds and activates one or both Axis (centerX/centerY) constraints that are relative to another given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrain(side:view:at:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: constrains the given side of the view to the given view’s

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainCenter(to:in:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the center of the view to be positioned at the given point, relative to the given view‘s center.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainTopToBottom(of:constant:relation:isSafe:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the top side of the calling view to the bottom side of the given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainBottomToTop(of:constant:relation:isSafe:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the bottom side of the calling view to the top side of the given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainRightToLeft(of:constant:relation:isSafe:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the right side of the calling view to the left side of the given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainLeftToRight(of:constant:relation:isSafe:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the left side of the calling view to the right side of the given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainWidthAndHeight(constant:relation:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the width and height of the view to a constant.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainHeightAndWidth(constant:relation:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the width and height of the view to a constant.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainWidthToHeight(multiplier:constant:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the width to the height of the calling view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainHeightToWidth(multiplier:constant:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the height to the width of the calling view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainHeightAndWidth(to:multiplier:constant:relation:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the width and height of the calling view relative to the width and height of the given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.name: constrainWidthAndHeight(to:multiplier:constant:relation:priority:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC13AM.abstract: Constrains the width and height of the calling view relative to the width and height of the given view.

Enums/SideY.html#/s:13AMConstraints5Side.name: top
Enums/SideY.html#/s:13AMConstraints5Side.abstract: Represents the top side edge of the view.

Enums/SideY.html#/s:13AMConstraints5Side.name: bottom
Enums/SideY.html#/s:13AMConstraints5Side.abstract: Represents the bottom side edge of the view.

Enums/SideX.html#/s:13AMConstraints5Side.name: left
Enums/SideX.html#/s:13AMConstraints5Side.abstract: Represents the left side edge of the view.

Enums/SideX.html#/s:13AMConstraints5Side.name: right
Enums/SideX.html#/s:13AMConstraints5Side.abstract: Represents the right side edge of the view.

Enums/Side.html#/s:13AMConstraints4SideO.name: top
Enums/Side.html#/s:13AMConstraints4SideO.abstract: Represents the top side edge of the view.

Enums/Side.html#/s:13AMConstraints4SideO.name: bottom
Enums/Side.html#/s:13AMConstraints4SideO.abstract: Represents the bottom side edge of the view.

Enums/Side.html#/s:13AMConstraints4SideO.name: left
Enums/Side.html#/s:13AMConstraints4SideO.abstract: Represents the left side edge of the view.

Enums/Side.html#/s:13AMConstraints4SideO.name: right
Enums/Side.html#/s:13AMConstraints4SideO.abstract: Represents the ride side edge of the view.

Enums/Axis.html.name: Axis
Enums/Axis.html.abstract: Enum to represent both center Axes of a UIView.

Enums/Dimension.html.name: Dimension
Enums/Dimension.html.abstract: Enum to represent both dimensions of a UIView.

Enums/Side.html.name: Side
Enums/Side.html.abstract: Enum to represent all 4 sides of a UIView.

Enums/SideX.html.name: SideX
Enums/SideX.html.abstract: Enum to represent only horizontal sides of a UIView.

Enums/SideY.html.name: SideY
Enums/SideY.html.abstract: Enum to represent only vertical sides of a UIView.
